name: John Erickson- Marketing Guy
overview:
Being able to take a limited amount of resources that are present and create something useful is a rare quality. Finding someone that can do just that is even more rare. Today’s most everyone wants to tell you that if they just had more time, more money, or more of something they could have done whatever it was that you needed. Of course, it was never their fault that they did not accomplish the task at hand either.

John the Marketing guy, does not make those claims we look at what fresources you have and figure out the game and the rules then we find a way for us to help you win the game. Sound simple, sure it is, it requires hard work, dedication, trust, and creativity.

Some might call that the American Dream. We call it getting the job done.

Take five minutes and call us. If not satisfied that you should set a meeting. Hang up and you have only wasted five minutes. We are confident that we can provide results. No we don’t hit grand slams or home runs everytime we are up to bat. However, we are great at winning. We do it by consistently hitting base hits, doubles and triples.

So tell us the rules, show us the game, and we will find a way for you to win the game.

John D Erickson John the Marketing Guy
